title: How do I lengthen or extend the name of bookmarks in the bookmarks toolbar?
content: Hi A few of my bookmarks title in bookmarks toolbar get shortened even though there's even longer ones. I tried this solution that worked to some degree but didn't solve the problem and every time I add or edit a bookmark those bookmarks get shortened again. This issue accrued after the last update.

title: Firefox sizing issue in Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
content:
While using firefox, the sizing suddenly has issue in minimize and maximize, this happens frequently under Ubuntu 22.04 LTS, never happen in Ubuntu 20.04LTS. The only solution now is open new window and move existing tabs to the new window.

Can refer screenshot, where you see the window at the back is missing a portion of rendering on the right. Is there any solution for this?
creator: samgooi4189

title: Youtube Suttering
content:
The video's play fine, but when I click off the browser into another app, the video begins to lag and stutter.

I've tried to mess with the Performance settings to no avail - also disabled extensions with the same result.
creator: serialdesigner

title: Problems with Instagram
content: Up until some time last week, Instagram was working fine for me on the PC. I could pull up pages and scroll through the pictures and videos just fine....and I still can. However, I used to be able to click on a picture and the picture would sort of pop forward and I could see all the comments and there were direction arrows on either side so I could move to the next or last image. That is no longer the case. If I want to see the image a bit bigger, or read or add comments, I have to right click on the image and open in a new tab. The new tab will show the image and comments but there are no arrows to move to next or last image. Not sure what has happened. If it is something to do with Firefox or if it is a problem on Instagram's end. I can still use instagram and view images etc, but a lot of the ease of using it has disappeared.
creator: Ashkevron

title: When I am in Firefox browser and want to move the window PC 10 to a corner it won't move.
content: When I am in Firefox browser" and want to move the window PC 10 to a corner it won't move. How do i solved this problem? It is stuck. I don't have the problem with Google Chrome-- it works well.
